channel.title: Pictures on Sample Book
channel.description: Recent content in Pictures on Sample Book

item.title: Figure
item.description: Figure # Figure shortcode can be used as a way of displaying the images with caption. ![Caption](Path "css-classes") Example # Figure with 50% Figure with 50% ![Figure with 50%](figure.jpeg "w-50 float-end")

item.title: Diagram
item.description: Diagram # Diagram shortcode can be used as a way of displaying the images with caption. {{< diagram "css-class" "caption" >}} **Markdown content** Caption {{< /diagram >}} Example # ┌ │ └ ┌ │ └ ─ A ─ ─ A ─ ─ l ─ ─ l ─ ─ i ┬ │ │ │ │ │ │ ┴ i ─ ─ c ─ ─ H < ─ c ─ ─ e ─ H ─ e ─ ─ e ─ ┐ │ ┘ e ─ l ─ ┐ │ ┘ l ─ l ─ l ─ o ─ o ─ ─ ─ A ─ B ─ l ─ o ─ i ─ b ─ c ─ ┌ │ └ !

item.title: Mermaid Chart
item.description: Mermaid Chart # MermaidJS is library for generating svg charts and diagrams from text. Override Mermaid Initialization Config To override the initialization config for Mermaid, create a mermaid.json file in your assets folder! Example # {{</* mermaid [class="text-center"]*/>}} stateDiagram-v2 State1: The state with a note note right of State1 Important information! You can write notes. end note State1 --> State2 note left of State2 : This is the note to the left.
